title: 20-Minute Chicken Enchiladas
directions: Combine first 9 ingredients in a medium saucepan; stir with a whisk.
Bring to a boil over high heat; cook 2 minutes or until thickened.
Add chicken and beans to pan; cook 2 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly heated.
ingredients: 1 cup unsalted chicken stock (such as Swanson)
3 cups shredded skinless, boneless rotisserie chicken breast (about 15 ounces)
1 (15-ounce) can unsalted black beans, rinsed and drained
3 ounces preshredded 4-cheese Mexican blend cheese (about 3/4 cup)
